---
title: "How to develop Quarto"
date: 2023-05-25
format: html
---

1. Clone the repo
2. Run configure;
3. Run Deno with special flags/options



If you try to run quarto.ts directly without any special options, you get an relative path import error

![](./../run1.png)

To fix that, you need to add the import_map to allow wildcards in the import paths.

![](./../run2.png)
